name: translateText
description: Translates strings written to a Cloud Firestore collection into multiple languages (uses Cloud Translation API).

env.name: LANGUAGES
env.description: A comma-separated list of target languages for translations (Ex: en,es,de)

env.name: INPUT_FIELD_NAME
env.description: The name of the field that contains the text to be translated

env.name: OUTPUT_FIELD_NAME
env.description: The name of the field to store translations
